how_to_preview_your_map.page_title: How to Preview Your Map | MapStuff.io
how_to_preview_your_map.title: How to Preview Your Map
how_to_preview_your_map.step_1: Before adding to your app, make sure your map is complete with all the details and on point with your brand.
how_to_preview_your_map.step_2: Take note to add your Mapbox key first in your map settings. This is required to see a preview of your map.
how_to_preview_your_map.step_4: In your dashboard, go to Mapbox Embed Code page.

add_to_shopify.title: How to Add a Map to Shopify
add_to_shopify.page_title: How to Add a Map to Shopify | MapStuff.io
add_to_shopify.step_2: Login in to your MapStuff account.
add_to_shopify.step_3: After creating your map, go to the Map Embed Code page.
add_to_shopify.step_5: Log in to your Shopify account.
add_to_shopify.step_6: In your dashboard, go to Online Store.
add_to_shopify.step_8: Create a new page. Provide your title.

how_to_integrate.title: How to Integrate a Map in any Website
how_to_integrate.page_title: How to Integrate a Map in any Website | MapStuff.io
how_to_integrate.step_1: Click on the CMS site where your site is on for a step-by-step guide on how to add map for your store’s branches, distributor or dealer locations, manufacturing sites, or whatever you need to map.
how_to_integrate.step_3: Login in to your MapStuff account.
how_to_integrate.step_4: After creating your map, go to the Map Embed Code page.
how_to_integrate.step_6: Log in to your website’s admin account.
how_to_integrate.step_7: In your dashboard, select or create a page where you want the map to show.

how_to_customize_map.title: How to Customize Your Map
how_to_customize_map.page_title: How to Customize Your Map | MapStuff.io
how_to_customize_map.step_1: A tailored map makes your map page become one with your app’s theme. By adjusting colors and changing markers for example, the page further emphasizes your brand’s identity especially to your potential customers.
how_to_customize_map.step_3: In your dashboard, go to the map settings page. It would be better to do this after adding at least 1 location in your map.
how_to_customize_map.step_4: Edit the fields according to your preferences.
how_to_customize_map.step_5: Click Preview Map to apply the new settings.
how_to_customize_map.step_7: More customizations for your map coming soon!

main_page.easy_to_install_manage: Easy to install and manage. With customizable features to match your brand identity.

features.title: MapStuff Features
features.description: A fully-responsive powerful app that's simplified for your business
features.subtitle: Make use of the comprehensive location data from Mapbox API with a search function to help your potential customer find the nearest store and drive in offline sales.
features.mobile_friendly_subtitle: Our map adapts to any device making a smooth user experience whether your customer is a mobile, tablet or desktop user.
features.tailored_map_subtitle: Customizable markers, themes, fonts, and colors design a layout that goes with your business’ brand.
features.no_developer_subtitle: Design and install your map in any app within a few minutes. ZERO coding experience needed!
features.Intuitive_dashboard_subtitle: Save time creating in the easy-to-navigate dashboard made to help you map and edit your locations faster.
features.easy_to_follow_subtitle: Refer to our documentation on the hows of getting set up plus other questions you might have.
features.integrate_platform_subtitle: Copy-paste embed code on any platform your business is on and that’s it!
